mapper.insert: INSERT INTO it_board (num,title,name, division, position, hit, content,bgroup,step,indent) values(it_boardnum_seq.nextval,#{title},#{name},#{division},#{position},0,#{content},it_boardnum_seq.currval,0,0)
mapper.select: SELECT num, title, name, division, position, cdate,udate, hit,content,bgroup,step,indent FROM it_board where num=#{num}
mapper.update: update it_board set hit = hit + 1 where num=#{num}
update it_board set isdel = 'Y' where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select count(num) from it_board where bgroup in ( select bgroup from it_board t1 where t1.num = #{num}) and num != #{num}
SELECT num,title,name, division, position, hit, content,bgroup,step,indent FROM it_board where num=#{num}
mapper.update: update it_board set step=step+1 where bgroup=#{bgroup} and step>#{step}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO it_board (num,title,name, division, position, hit, content, bgroup,step,indent) values(it_boardnum_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{name}, #{division}, #{position}, 0, #{content}, #{bgroup}, #{step}+1, #{indent}+1)
mapper.select: SELECT num,title,name, division, position, cdate,udate, hit,content,bgroup,step,indent FROM (select * from it_board order by bgroup desc, step asc)
